description: Trips outside the home are no longer limited in the Czech Republic.
title: Coronavirus: Czechs free to move again
title_page: Coronavirus: Czechs free to move again - BBC News
maintext: Broadcaster RTBF says the first phase will open up DIY stores, bike shops and some other small businesses. Then on 18 May schools are expected to reopen, along with hairdressers and some other businesses. But leisure facilities, such as gyms and cinemas, will remain shut.
